biography.bio: Chi-wei Chen is an actor, known for Dip huet fung wan (1990).
biography.name: Chi-wei Chen

biography.bio: Kuan Tai Chen was born on September 24, 1945 in Guangdong, China. He is an actor and producer, known for The Man with the Iron Fists (2012), Gallants (2010) and Bloody Monkey Master (1977).
biography.name: Kuan Tai Chen

biography.bio: Kang-Yeh Cheng was born on July 26, 1948 in Shanghai, China. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Executioners from Shaolin (1977), La rage du tigre (1971) and Le génie du kung fu (1979).
biography.name: Kang-Yeh Cheng

biography.bio: Mark Cheng was born on October 6, 1964 in Hong Kong as Lap-Hing Cheng. He is an actor, known for War (2007), Peking Opera Blues (1986) and Triad Election (2006).
biography.name: Mark Cheng

biography.bio: Mei Fung Chow is an actress, known for Shuo huang de nu ren (1989), Cuo zai xin xiu (1990) and Shen tan zhu gu li (1986).
biography.name: Mei Fung Chow

biography.bio: Gwai-Chi Dan is an actress and art director, known for Mu zhong wu ren (1989), Jing hun jin wan ye (1988) and Jiang shi fu xing zi (1991).
biography.name: Gwai-Chi Dan

biography.bio: Rosamund Kwan was born on September 24, 1962 in Hong Kong as Guan Ga Wei. She is an actress, known for La secte du lotus blanc (1992), Once Upon a Time in China (1991) and Mister Dynamite (1986). She was previously married to Pierre Chen and Guosheng Wang.
biography.name: Rosamund Kwan

biography.bio: Yao-min Li is an actor, known for Dip huet fung wan (1990).
biography.name: Yao-min Li

biography.placeOfBirth: Pematang Siantar, Oostkust van Sumatra, Dutch East Indies [now Pematangsiantar, North Sumatra, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Born in Indonesia to Cantonese parents, Lo migrated to Hong Kong in his teens, where he attended acting school and in 1962 joined the Shaw Bros. film company. By 1969 he had become the first kungfu superstar, preceding the legendary Bruce Lee. He acted in more than 100 films, usually cast as villains, then turned to directing in the 1980s. For over a decade ending in 1999, Lo was involved in television work in Hong Kong, until failing health forced him into semi-retirement.
biography.name: Lieh Lo

biography.bio: Kei Mai is known for his work on Huang jia shi jie (1985), When Fortune Smiles (1990) and Shen tan zhu gu li (1986).
biography.name: Kei Mai

biography.bio: Alex Man was born on July 25, 1957 in Guangdong, China. He is an actor, known for As Tears Go By (1988), Rouge (1987) and Hong Kong 1941 (1984). He has been married to Kwok Ming Lai since 2002. They have one child. He was previously married to Niu Tien.
biography.name: Alex Man

biography.bio: Fui-On Shing was born on February 1, 1955 in Hong Kong. He was an actor, known for The Crazy Companies (1988). He died on August 27, 2009 in Hong Kong, China.
biography.name: Fui-On Shing

biography.bio: Ho-Ying Sin was born on September 13, 1957 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony. He is an actor, known for Kickboxer (1989), Gen-X Cops (1999) and The Heir Apparent: Largo Winch (2008).
biography.name: Ho-Ying Sin

biography.bio: Wilson Tong is an actor and director, known for The 36th Chamber of Shaolin (1978), Le génie du kung fu (1979) and She xing zui bu (1980).
biography.name: Wilson Tong

biography.bio: Kenneth Tsang was born on January 1, 1938 in Shanghai, China. He is an actor and director, known for Rush Hour 2 (2001), Die Another Day (2002) and The Killer (1989). He has been married to Chiao Chiao since 1995.
biography.name: Kenneth Tsang
